Dishes and Bacteria¶

The dish module¶

Implements a dish with bacteria cultures.

class biolab.dish.Dish(num_a, num_b)[source]¶

Petri dish containing bacteria of types A and B.

Parameters:
  • num_a (int) – number of bacteria of type A in dish
  • num_b (int) – number of bacteria of type A in dish
aging()[source]¶

Age all bacteria in dish by one cycle.

death()[source]¶

Remove dying bacteria.

division()[source]¶

For each dividing bacterium, add one new.

get_num_a()[source]¶

Return number of A bacteria in dish.

get_num_b()[source]¶

Return number of B bacteria in dish.

The bacteria module¶

Implements a bacteria model.

class biolab.bacteria.Bacteria[source]¶

Bacteria which die and multiply with fixed probabilities.

Create bacterium with age 0.

ages()[source]¶

Bacterium ages by one cycle.

dies()[source]¶

Decide whether bacterium dies.

Returns:True if bacterium dies.
Return type:bool
divides()[source]¶

Decide whether bacterium divides.

Returns:True if bacterium divides.
Return type:bool
classmethod get_params()[source]¶

Get class parameters.

Returns:Dictionary with class parameters.
Return type:dict
p_death = 0.1¶

probability of death per cycle

p_divide = 0.2¶

probability of cell division per cycle

classmethod set_params(new_params)[source]¶

Set class parameters.

Parameters:new_params (dict) – Legal keys: ‘p_death’, ‘p_divide’
Raises:ValueError, KeyError
